com.jdeals.main.controller

Class Store

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jdeals.main.controller.Store

  • public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the dataset that store all items and discounts providing all methods to handle the cart, sell the items , requesting price calculation etc.
    Author:
    Giuseppe Ronca
